QuestionStem: Select the statements below that describe how an animal can contribute to the reproductive success of a plant.

options.AnswerText: A. Animals can carry pollen from one plant to the egg of another plant.
B. Animals can disperse plant seeds to areas with conditions favorable for growth.
C. Animals can use plant parts to deposit their eggs or for building materials.
D. Animals can use plants to hide from predators or prey.

CorrectFeedback: Animals can pollinate plants and help disperse seeds away from the parent plant.
PartiallyCorrectFeedback: Decide if this relationship between an animal and a plant helps the plant reproduce.
IncorrectFeedback: Decide if this relationship between an animal and a plant helps the plant reproduce.
FinalIncorrectFeedback: Animals can pollinate plants and help disperse seeds away from the parent plant.
